entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon. Fog patches this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
